mapper.select: SELECT r.idx, r.status, ai.file_name, a.accom_name, ar.room_name, r.check_in_date, r.check_out_date FROM tbl_reservation r, tbl_accom_room ar, tbl_accom a, tbl_accom_images ai WHERE r.accom_room_idx = ar.idx AND ar.accom_idx = a.idx AND ai.accom_idx = a.idx AND r.status = 'CA' AND r.member_idx = #{idx} ORDER BY r.check_in_date FETCH FIRST 2 ROWS ONLY
